com.CouponSystem.CouponSystem.Repositories

Interface CouponRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Coupon,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Coupon,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Coupon,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Coupon>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Coupon,java.lang.Long>

    @Repository
public interface CouponRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Coupon,java.lang.Long>

      • findByType

        java.util.List<Coupon> findByType(CouponType type)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • updateCoupon

        @Transactional
 @Modifying
 @Query(value="update Coupon c set c.price= :#{#coupon.getPrice()}, c.endDate= :#{#coupon.getEndDate()} where c.id = :#{#coupon.getId()}")
void updateCoupon(@Param(value="coupon")
                                                                                                                                                                                           Coupon coupon)
        Send query to update a coupon price and end date
        Parameters:
        coupon - A coupon to update

      • findByCompanyId

        java.util.List<Coupon> findByCompanyId(long companyId)
        Find all the coupons of a company by its id.
        Parameters:
        companyId - The company id of the company owning the coupons.
        Returns:
        All coupons owned by the company.

      • findByCompanyIdAndType

        java.util.List<Coupon> findByCompanyIdAndType(long companyId,
                                              CouponType type)
        Find all the coupons of a company by its id and a specific type.
        Parameters:
        companyId - The company id of the company owning the coupons.
        type - A coupon type to get coupons of.
        Returns:
        All coupons owned by the company having the requested type.

      • findByCompanyIdAndEndDateLessThanEqual

        java.util.List<Coupon> findByCompanyIdAndEndDateLessThanEqual(long companyId,
                                                              java.sql.Date endDate)
        Find all the coupons of a company by its id and also that their end date is at and before the requested end date.
        Parameters:
        companyId - The company id of the company owning the coupons.
        endDate - A date that the coupon expires on.
        Returns:
        All coupons owned by the company having their date before the requested date

      • findByCompanyIdAndPriceLessThanEqual

        java.util.List<Coupon> findByCompanyIdAndPriceLessThanEqual(long companyId,
                                                            java.lang.Double price)
        Find all the coupons of a company by its id and also that their price is equal or less then the requested price
        Parameters:
        companyId - The company id of the company owning the coupons.
        price - The price of the coupon
        Returns:
        ALl coupons owned by the company having their price equal or less then the requested price
